data.title: James Franklin Davison
data.text:
The following exerpt is from : HISTORY OF THE DAVISON FAMILY / 1785 -- 1934

The first Davison we have only knowledge of is John Davidson.

He is Scotch-Irish descent. His wife was Elizabeth Wilson. John Davison had three daughters -

- Jane Caldwell ; Sallie McMillen and Mrs. Stear. He also had one son -- Isaac DAVISON.

ISAAC DAVISON was born May 1, 1782 or 1785. (One record says 1782 and another 1785)

He came to the United States when about four years old, probably 1789. He died June 1, 1849.

He married Jane Kinney, born July 20, 1780 and died on March 8, 1845. (Second wife was

Mrs. Armstrong Jack) Jane Kinney had four sisters; Betsy Alison, Nancy Coulter, Margaret

Scott and Fannie McManigal.

​Leo Shirley (6) Bumpus

(Elma Elizabeth 5 Davison, James Franklin 4, John 3, Isaac H. 2, John 1)

was born May 10, 1889, and died October 31, 1972 in

Venango Co., Pa., He married twice:

( 1 ) Nora Bernice Brown - Feb. 19, 1916, Cooperstown,

Venango Co., Pa.

Born - July 26, 1888 / Died - October 8, 1935

Daughter of Wesley Brown and Sarah Forker

( 2 ) Marie Twila George Riddle - Sep. 25, 1939

Born - Nov. 29, 1893 / Died - Feb. 14, 1972

(All are buried at the Sunville Cemetery, Venango Co., Pa.)

Children of Leo Bumpus and Nora Brown are:

i. Bernice Jane (7) Bumpus, b. Dec. 13, 1919, Bradleytown,

Venango Co., Pa. d. Oct. 17, 1985, Bradleytown, Pa. She

Married Robert G. Noel, Oct. 22, 1943. He was born 30

April 1916 and died 24 Oct 1994. They are both buried

at Sunville, Venango County, Pennsylvania. They had

3 daughters - 2 living into adulthood with families.

ii. Margaret Elma Bumpus, b. July 14, 1921, Bradleytown,

Venango Co., Pa. d. Aug. 17, 1997, Butler, Pa. She

is buried at Slippery Rock, Butler County, Pennsylvania.

Married James Harold McBride, Nov. 3, 1944. He was born

10 September 1923. They had 5 children all living into

adulthood with families.

iii. Infant Daughter Bumpus, born/died 1924

iv. Frederick Wesley Bumpus, b. Nov. 20, 1926, d. April 15, 1942

Bradleytown, Venango Co., Pa.

v. Ruth Shirley Bumpus, born/died 1928

vi. Florence Elizabeth Bumpus, b. Jan 8, 1930. Bradleytown,

Venango Co., Pa. - d. 21 May 2008. Married Elery L. Smith

10 Nov 1951. He was born 20 Aug 1927. He died 19 Apr 2014.

They are both buried at Ashton, Venango Co., Pennsylvania.

​ Thay had 4 children living into adulthood with families.
